item.title: Unsupervised Domain Adaptation for Nighttime Aerial Tracking
item.description: Illustration of the proposed unsupervised domain adaptation framework for nighttime aerial tracking.

item.title: Tracker Meets Night: A Transformer Enhancer for UAV Tracking
item.description: Overall performance of SOTA trackers with the proposed SCT enabled (markers in a dark color) or not (markers in a light color) in the newly constructed nighttime UAV tracking benchmark—DarkTrack2021. SCT significantly boosts the nighttime tracking performance of trackers in a plug-and-play manner.

item.title: DarkLighter: Light Up the Darkness for UAV Tracking
item.description: Tracking performance comparison in a typical dark scene with the proposed DarkLighter module activated (in red) or not (in pink).

item.title: Mutation Sensitive Correlation Filter for Real-Time UAV Tracking with Adaptive Hybrid Label
item.description: Tracking procedure of the proposed MSCF tracker. Dashed boxes denote the variables to be solved in the main regression. As MTF in the red box is generated from search region in frame k, it is applied to adjust the altitude value of the cruciform pedestal.

Guangze Zheng is an undergraduate student at Tongji University and currently pursuing B.Eng. degree in mechanical engineering. His research interests include visual object tracking and machine learning.
